summary: Tragedy strikes as two ruthless brothers kidnap a bride during her wedding. Hurt and angry, H.H. begins his quest to find the love he lost, and take vengeance upon the wicked. Comin' at Ya.
cast: Tony Anthony|Gene Quintano|Victoria Abril|Ricardo Palacios|Lewis Gordon|Rafael Albaicín|Luis Barboo|Charly Bravo|Domenico Cianfriglia|Joaquín Gómez|Goffredo Unger
title: Yendo hacia ti
